participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Caring and nurturing, Jessica finds joy in simple pleasures and cherishes her relationships.
participant_1.background: I put on my favorite Charlie Daniels song and cuddle with my dog. I have a black belt in karate. If I’m not drinking, I’m thinking, which makes me uncomfortable. My children are a disappointment. I got married last year.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and active, Michael enjoys socializing and staying fit while also valuing his alone time.
participant_2.background: I want to find a way to keep my curly hair in place. My biggest challenge is balancing my social life with my work and family. I started playing recreational baseball more often and even took lessons to improve my skills. I am close to my family, but I sometimes have to spend time alone to recharge. I am a morning person.

content.text: I'm good, just got done playing baseball. How about you?
Not much, just cuddled with my dog after putting on my favorite Charlie Daniels song.
What kind of dog do you have?
A golden retriever! He's a great dog.
I love golden retrievers! They're so friendly and fluffy.
They are! I'm so glad I got him.
How long have you had him?
A little over a year now.
That's awesome! Do you have any other pets?
Well he sounds like a great companion.
He is! I love him to death.
So, what do you do for work?
Oh cool! What grade do you teach?
That's awesome! I love kids that age.
